Articles.Content: I'm in a dilemma right now. KerbalGalaxy sounds soo cool with the Neutron Star, and it would be cool to put a base on one of the planets. Alternis Kerbol has always been a favorite of mine and I really want to set up a base on Ike or Gilly (the 2 comets). I'm stuck on a descision, so I need help big time. All I want to know is how buggy each one is and what's better for base-building in general. Thanks a lot. Dosvandona.
I see no reason not to install them both, if your computer can handle it. if it cant, go with Alternis Kerbol or New Horisons

[QUOTE!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/#79070377)=Dunrana;2025119]I see no reason not to install them both, if your computer can handle it. if it cant, go with Alternis Kerbol or New Horisons[[QUOTE!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/#90533693)]

Thanks.
